Zergling/=A7/BH/Blastrage/=A7/Sniper/=A7/Scorponok


Zergling runs to Zardu=
s, "Master Zardus, Master Zardus, Who do I
fight?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
BH looks at Nemisis Enforcer. He=
 fires 50 Lasers and 3 Optic Blast.

BLASTRAGE sits on the Skimmer. He sees=
 Iron Raptor. He fires 10x
Gernade at her, with 2 Optic Blast. He pulls out=
 a Flame Thrower and
Burns the ground watching a fire start.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~`
Sniper sees all the la=
sers and rockets coming at his. He fires his 2
rifles at the missles making=
 them explode. he then turns towards Koga
and fires 6 lasers(12 in a, He us=
ed his 2 rifles) with each gun. He
then gets hit with the 3 of the 5 lasers=
.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scorpon=
ok looks at QuickStrike. "Is there something wrong with you,
sub-commander?=
 Why are you acting so out of it?"
